body:
Comment 3: 
makes sense, even if in my case what caught me was something like this:

namespace mana {
 namespace reco {
   double deltaPhi(double a, double b);
 }
 namespace analysis {
   double deltaPhi(double a, double b);
 }
}

where the semantics of the difference between 2 azimuthal angles differ in these 2 cases.

these 2 functions live in the same "master" namespace, albeit in 2 different
"specialized" sub-ones...

anyways... until (if?) swig uses a real C++ parser, I guess one has to live with its
limitations and work around those.

-s

(after all these tradeoffs and decisions making, I feel I need to replenish my glucose
levels ;)
